alert.note: Alert for Montmorency; Otsego (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 20 at 3:55PM EDT until May 20 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Otsego County in northern Michigan... Northwestern Montmorency County in northern Michigan... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 354 PM EDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Sparr, or near Gaylord, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Multiple reports of a tornado in progress near Gaylord. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * The tornado will be near... Eastern Corwith Township around 400 PM EDT. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
